column2:
The realm of mankind. A world ruled by humans, where they largely live untested by others save themselves. 
  Who would have thought such a place exists. Yet my kind appears to be known to some, although we're largely considered little more than legends, perhaps of some now forgotten era. 
  The glimmering waters brought me here from my lands, and through skill and luck, I've managed to find myself a leader among the humans. While not all humans are bad, I do consider many of them to be foolish. Foolish enough to not appreciate such a bountiful world as this. A world that my brethren would thrive upon. 
  Now that I'm in a position of power, it's time to act. My fellow Orcs would appreciate and utilize what this world offers. I shall be the clan's vanguard. I shall open the way for others to come.

The realm of mankind. A world ruled by humans, where they largely live untested by others save themselves. 
  Who would have thought such a place exists. Yet my kind appears to be known to some, although we're largely considered little more than legends, perhaps of some now forgotten era. 
  The glimmering waters brought me here from my lands, and through skill and luck, I've managed to find myself a leader among the humans. While not all humans are bad, I do consider many of them to be foolish. Foolish enough to not appreciate such a bountiful world as this. A world that my brethren would thrive upon. 
  Now that I'm in a position of power, it's time to act. My fellow Orcs would appreciate and utilize what this world offers. I shall be the clan's vanguard. I shall open the way for others to come.
My rule shall be the dawn of a new era.
